sourcesContent:
import './index.css' import {Component} from 'react' class Speedometer extends Component { state = {speedCount: 0} onAccelerate = () => this.setState(prevState => ({speedCount: prevState.speedCount + 10})) render() { const {speedCount} = this.state return (

Speedometer

Speed is {speedCount}mph

Min Limit is 0mph. Max Limit is 200mph

) } } export default Speedometer
